body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0005]/value as T0_test_name,
  f/items[at0029]/value as T0_specimen_type
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result.v1] CONTAINS CLUSTER f[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1]
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
LIMIT
  10
